items.name: APEX_THEMES
items.description: List of APEX built-in, public and workspace themes

items.name: APEX_UI_DEFAULTS_ATTR_DICT
items.description: The Attribute Dictionary is specific to a workspace.  It is part of User Interface Defaults and can be used in report and form creation.

items.name: APEX_UI_DEFAULTS_COLUMNS
items.description: The User Interface Defaults for the columns within this schema.

items.name: APEX_UI_DEFAULTS_GROUPS
items.description: The User Interface Defaults for the groups within the tables in this schema.  Used by the wizards when generating applications.

items.name: APEX_UI_DEFAULTS_LOV_DATA
items.description: If you create a form, report, or tabular form that includes this column and if the appropriate Display As Type is set to use a list of values (Radio Group or Select List) then a Named List of Values will be created within the application and will be referenced by the resulting item or report column.

items.name: APEX_UI_DEFAULTS_TABLES
items.description: The User Interface Defaults for the tables within this schema.  Used by the wizards when generating applications.

items.name: APEX_WEBSERVICE_LOG
items.description: Identifies web service requests in the APEX instance.

items.name: APEX_WORKSPACES
items.description: Available Oracle APEX workspaces

items.name: APEX_APPLICATIONS
items.description: Applications defined in the current workspace or database user.

items.name: APEX_APPLICATION_ALL_AUTH
items.description: All authorization schemes for all components by Application

items.name: APEX_APPLICATION_AUTH
items.description: Identifies the available Authentication Schemes defined for an Application

items.name: APEX_APPLICATION_AUTHORIZATION
items.description: Identifies Authorization Schemes which can be applied at the application, page or component level

items.name: APEX_APPLICATION_BC_ENTRIES
items.description: Identifies Breadcrumb Entries which map to a Page and identify a pages parent

items.name: APEX_APPLICATION_BREADCRUMBS
items.description: Identifies the definition of a collection of Breadcrumb Entries which are used to identify a page Hierarchy

items.name: APEX_APPLICATION_BUILD_OPTIONS
items.description: Identifies Build Options available to an application

items.name: APEX_APPLICATION_CACHING
items.description: Applications defined in the current workspace or database user.

items.name: APEX_APPLICATION_COMPUTATIONS
items.description: Identifies Application Computations which can run for every page or on login

items.name: APEX_APPLICATION_GROUPS
items.description: Application Groups defined per workspace.  Applications can be associated with an application group.

items.name: APEX_APPLICATION_ITEMS
items.description: Identifies Application Items used to maintain session state that are not associated with a page

items.name: APEX_APPLICATION_LISTS
items.description: Identifies a named collection of Application List Entries which can be included on any page using a region of type List.  Display attributes are controlled using a List Template.

items.name: APEX_APPLICATION_LIST_ENTRIES
items.description: Identifies the List Entries which define a List.  List Entries can be hierarchical or flat.

items.name: APEX_APPLICATION_LOCKED_PAGES
items.description: Locked pages of an application

items.name: APEX_APPLICATION_LOVS
items.description: Identifies a shared list of values that can be referenced by a Page Item or Report Column

items.name: APEX_APPLICATION_LOV_COLS
items.description: Identifies column metadata for a shared list of values.

items.name: APEX_APPLICATION_LOV_ENTRIES
items.description: Identifies the List of Values Entries which comprise a shared List of Values

items.name: APEX_APPLICATION_NAV_BAR
items.description: Identifies navigation bar entries displayed on pages that use a Page Template that include a #NAVIGATION_BAR# substitution string

items.name: APEX_APPLICATION_PAGES
items.description: A Page definition is the basic building block of page. Page components including regions, items, buttons, computations, branches, validations, and processes further define the definition of a page.

items.name: APEX_APPLICATION_PAGE_BRANCHES
items.description: Identifies branch processing associated with a page.  A branch is a directive to navigate to a page or URL which is run at the conclusion of page accept processing.

items.name: APEX_APPLICATION_PAGE_COMP
items.description: Identifies the computation of Item Session State

items.name: APEX_APPLICATION_PAGE_DA
items.description: Identifies Dynamic Actions associated with a Page

items.name: APEX_APPLICATION_PAGE_DA_ACTS
items.description: Identifies the Actions of a Dynamic Action associated with a Page

items.name: APEX_APPLICATION_PAGE_DB_ITEMS
items.description: Identifies Page Items which are associated with Database Table Columns.  This view represents a subset of the items in the APEX_APPLICATION_PAGE_ITEMS view.

items.name: APEX_APPLICATION_PAGE_GROUPS
items.description: Identifies page groups

items.name: APEX_APPLICATION_PAGE_MAP
items.description: Identifies the full breadcrumb path for each page with a breadcrumb entry

items.name: APEX_APPLICATION_PAGE_PROC
items.description: Identifies SQL or PL/SQL processing associated with a page

items.name: APEX_APPLICATION_PAGE_REGIONS
items.description: Identifies a content container associated with a Page and displayed within a position defined by the Page Template

items.name: APEX_APPLICATION_PAGE_CHARTS
items.description: Identifies a chart associated with a Page and Region.

items.name: APEX_APPLICATION_PAGE_CHART_A
items.description: Identifies a chart axis associated with a chart on a Page and Region.

items.name: APEX_APPLICATION_PAGE_CHART_S
items.description: Identifies a chart series associated with a chart on a Page and Region.

items.name: APEX_APPLICATION_PAGE_IR
items.description: Identifies attributes of an interactive report

items.name: APEX_APPLICATION_PAGE_IR_CAT
items.description: Report column category definitions for interactive report columns

items.name: APEX_APPLICATION_PAGE_IR_CGRPS
items.description: Column group definitions for interactive report columns

items.name: APEX_APPLICATION_PAGE_IR_COL
items.description: Report column definitions for interactive report columns

items.name: APEX_APPLICATION_PAGE_IR_RPT
items.description: Identifies user-level report settings for an interactive report

items.name: APEX_APPLICATION_PAGE_IR_COMP
items.description: Identifies computations defined in user-level report settings for an interactive report

items.name: APEX_APPLICATION_PAGE_IR_COND
items.description: Identifies filters and highlights defined in user-level report settings for an interactive report

items.name: APEX_APPLICATION_PAGE_IR_GRPBY
items.description: Identifies group by view defined in user-level report settings for an interactive report

items.name: APEX_APPLICATION_PAGE_IR_PIVOT
items.description: Identifies pivot view defined in user-level report settings for an interactive report

items.name: APEX_APPLICATION_PAGE_IR_PVAGG
items.description: Identifies aggregates defined for a pivot view in user-level report settings for an interactive report

items.name: APEX_APPLICATION_PAGE_IR_PVSRT
items.description: Identifies sorts defined for a pivot view in user-level report settings for an interactive report

items.name: APEX_APPLICATION_PAGE_IR_SUB
items.description: Identifies subscriptions scheduled in saved reports for an interactive report

items.name: APEX_APPLICATION_PAGE_REG_COLS
items.description: Region column definitions used for regions

items.name: APEX_APPLICATION_PAGE_RPT
items.description: Printing attributes for regions that are reports

items.name: APEX_APPLICATION_PAGE_RPT_COLS
items.description: Report column definitions used for Classic Reports, Tabular Forms and Interactive Reports

items.name: APEX_APPLICATION_PAGE_TREES
items.description: Deprecated. Use apex_application_page_regions instead.

items.name: APEX_APPL_PAGE_CARD_ACTIONS
items.description: Card actions definitions

items.name: APEX_APPL_PAGE_IGS
items.description: Interactive grid definitions

items.name: APEX_APPL_PAGE_IG_RPT_AGGS
items.description: Interactive grid report aggregate definitions

items.name: APEX_APPL_PAGE_IG_RPT_CHT_COLS
items.description: Interactive grid report chart column definitions

items.name: APEX_APPL_PAGE_IG_RPT_COLUMNS
items.description: Interactive grid report column definitions

items.name: APEX_APPL_PAGE_IG_RPT_HIGHLTS
items.description: Interactive grid report highlight definitions

items.name: APEX_APPL_PAGE_IG_RPT_COMPUTES
items.description: Interactive grid report computed column definitions

items.name: APEX_APPL_PAGE_IG_RPT_FILTERS
items.description: Interactive grid report filter definitions

items.name: APEX_APPL_PAGE_IG_RPT_VIEWS
items.description: Interactive grid report view definitions

items.name: APEX_APPL_PAGE_IG_COLUMNS
items.description: Interactive grid column definitions

items.name: APEX_APPL_PAGE_IG_COL_GROUPS
items.description: Interactive grid column group definitions

items.name: APEX_APPL_PAGE_IG_RPTS
items.description: Interactive grid report definitions

items.name: APEX_APPL_PAGE_MAP_LAYERS
items.description: Map layer definitions

items.name: APEX_APPL_PAGE_SEARCH_SOURCES
items.description: Stores the meta data for Search Configuration usages within a search region.

items.name: APEX_APPL_PAGE_CARDS
items.description: Cards definitions

items.name: APEX_APPL_PAGE_MAPS
items.description: Map region definitions

items.name: APEX_APPLICATION_PAGE_VAL
items.description: Identifies Validations associated with an Application Page

items.name: APEX_APPL_PAGE_CALENDARS
items.description: Identifies Application Calendars

items.name: APEX_APPL_PAGE_COMP_ACTIONS
items.description: Action definitions for page components

items.name: APEX_APPL_PAGE_MENU_ENTRIES
items.description: Menu Entry definitions for actions of a region or IR column

items.name: APEX_APPL_PAGE_META_TAGS
items.description: Identifies page meta tags

items.name: APEX_APPL_PAGE_BG_PROC_STATUS
items.description: Identifies page processing running in the background

items.name: APEX_APPLICATION_PAGE_BUTTONS
items.description: Identifies buttons associated with a Page and Region

items.name: APEX_APPLICATION_PAGE_ITEMS
items.description: Identifies Page Items which are used to render HTML form content.  Items automatically maintain session state which can be accessed using bind variables or substitution stings.

items.name: APEX_APPL_PAGE_FILTERS
items.description: Identifies Filters which are used within a Faceted Search or Smart Filters region.

items.name: APEX_APPL_PAGE_FILTER_GROUPS
items.description: Identifies filter groups on a page.

items.name: APEX_APPLICATION_PARENT_TABS
items.description: Identifies a collection of tabs called a Tab Set.  Each tab is part of a tab set and can be current for one or more pages.  Each tab can also have a corresponding Parent Tab if two levels of Tabs are defined.

items.name: APEX_APPLICATION_PROCESSES
items.description: Identifies Application Processes which can run for every page, on login or upon demand

items.name: APEX_APPLICATION_RPT_LAYOUTS
items.description: Identifies report layout which can be referenced by report queries and classic reports

items.name: APEX_APPLICATION_RPT_QUERIES
items.description: Identifies report queries, which are printable documents that can be integrated with an application using buttons, list items, branches

items.name: APEX_APPL_RPT_QRY_SOURCES
items.description: Identifies inidividual report sources, which are part of a report query

items.name: APEX_APPLICATION_SETTINGS
items.description: Identifies application settings typically used by applications to manage configuration parameter names and values

items.name: APEX_APPLICATION_SHORTCUTS
items.description: Identifies Application Shortcuts which can be referenced "MY_SHORTCUT" syntax

items.name: APEX_APPLICATION_STATIC_FILES
items.description: Stores the files like CSS, images, javascript files, ... of an application.

items.name: APEX_APPLICATION_SUBSTITUTIONS
items.description: Application level definitions of substitution strings.

items.name: APEX_APPLICATION_SUPP_OBJECTS
items.description: Identifies the Supporting Object installation messages

items.name: APEX_APPLICATION_SUPP_OBJ_BOPT
items.description: Identifies the Application Build Options that will be exposed to the Supporting Object installation

items.name: APEX_APPLICATION_SUPP_OBJ_CHCK
items.description: Identifies the Supporting Object pre-installation checks to ensure the database is compatible with the objects to be installed

items.name: APEX_APPLICATION_SUPP_OBJ_SCR
items.description: Identifies the Supporting Object installation SQL Scripts

items.name: APEX_APPLICATION_TABS
items.description: Identifies a set of tabs collected into tab sets which are associated with a Standard Tab Entry

items.name: APEX_APPLICATION_THEMES
items.description: Identifies a named collection of Templates

items.name: APEX_APPLICATION_TEMPLATES
items.description: Identifies reference counts for templates of all types

items.name: APEX_APPLICATION_TEMP_BC
items.description: Identifies the HTML template markup used to render a Breadcrumb

items.name: APEX_APPLICATION_TEMP_BUTTON
items.description: Identifies the HTML template markup used to display a Button

items.name: APEX_APPLICATION_TEMP_CALENDAR
items.description: Identifies the HTML template markup used to display a Calendar

items.name: APEX_APPLICATION_TEMP_LABEL
items.description: Identifies a Page Item Label HTML template display attributes

items.name: APEX_APPLICATION_TEMP_LIST
items.description: Identifies HTML template markup used to render a List with List Elements

items.name: APEX_APPLICATION_TEMP_PAGE
items.description: The Page Template which identifies the HTML used to organized and render a page content

items.name: APEX_APPL_TEMP_PAGE_DP
items.description: The Page Template Slots identify the available slots in a page template

items.name: APEX_APPLICATION_TEMP_POPUPLOV
items.description: Identifies the HTML template markup and some functionality of all Popup List of Values controls for this application

items.name: APEX_APPLICATION_TEMP_REGION
items.description: Identifies a regions HTML template display attributes

items.name: APEX_APPL_TEMP_REGION_DP
items.description: The Region Template Slots identify the available slots in a region template

items.name: APEX_APPLICATION_TEMP_REPORT
items.description: Identifies the HTML template markup used to render a Report Headings and Rows

items.name: APEX_APPLICATION_THEME_STYLES
items.description: The Theme Style identifies the CSS file URLs which should be used for a theme

items.name: APEX_APPL_TEMPLATE_OPTIONS
items.description: The Template Options identify available CSS classes for pages, regions, report, breadcrumbs, lists, items and buttons

items.name: APEX_APPL_TEMPLATE_OPT_GROUPS
items.description: The Template Option Groups identify groups associated with tempalte options

items.name: APEX_APPLICATION_THEME_FILES
items.description: Stores the files like CSS, images, javascript files, ... of a theme.

items.name: APEX_APPLICATION_TRANSLATIONS
items.description: Identifies message primary language text and translated text

items.name: APEX_APPLICATION_TRANS_DYNAMIC
items.description: Application dynamic translations.  These are created in the Translation section of Shared Components, and referenced at runtime via the function APEX_LANG.LANG.

items.name: APEX_APPLICATION_TRANS_MAP
items.description: Identifies language mappings configured for applications

items.name: APEX_APPLICATION_TRANS_REPOS
items.description: Repository of translation strings.  These are populated from the translation seeding process.

items.name: APEX_APPLICATION_TREES
items.description: Identifies a tree control which can be referenced and displayed by creating a region with a source of this tree

items.name: APEX_APPLICATION_WEB_SERVICES
items.description: Web Services referenceable from this Application

items.name: APEX_APPL_ACL_ROLES
items.description: Identifies Application Roles, which are workspace groups that are tied to a specific application

items.name: APEX_APPL_ACL_USERS
items.description: Identifies Application Users used to map application users to application roles

items.name: APEX_APPL_ACL_USER_ROLES
items.description: Identifies Application Users used to map application users to application roles

items.name: APEX_APPL_AI_CONFIGS
items.description: AI configurations within an application

items.name: APEX_APPL_AI_CONFIG_RAG_SRCS
items.description: RAG sources of an AI configuration

items.name: APEX_APPL_AUTOMATIONS
items.description: Stores the meta data for automations of an application.

items.name: APEX_AUTOMATION_LOG
items.description: Log of automation executions.

items.name: APEX_AUTOMATION_MSG_LOG
items.description: Messages of an automation execution.

items.name: APEX_APPL_AUTOMATION_ACTIONS
items.description: Identifies actions associated with an automation

items.name: APEX_APPL_COMPONENT_GROUPS
items.description: Identifies a named collection of components which can be bulk copied or subscribed from one application to another.

items.name: APEX_APPL_COMP_GRP_COMPONENTS
items.description: Identifies components that are part of a component group.

items.name: APEX_APPL_CONCATENATED_FILES
items.description: Concatenated files of a user interface

items.name: APEX_APPL_DATA_LOADS
items.description: Identifies Application Data Load definitions

items.name: APEX_APPL_DATA_PROFILES
items.description: Available Data Profiles used for parsing CSV, XLSX, JSON, XML and other data

items.name: APEX_APPL_DATA_PROFILE_COLS
items.description: Data Profile columns used for parsing JSON, XML and other data

items.name: APEX_APPL_DEVELOPER_COMMENTS
items.description: Developer comments of an application

items.name: APEX_APPL_DUALITY_VIEWS
items.description: Available Duality View Sources within an application

items.name: APEX_APPL_EMAIL_TEMPLATES
items.description: Stores the meta data for the email templates of an application.

items.name: APEX_APPL_INVOKE_API_PARAMS
items.description: Invoke API parameter values for individual APEX components

items.name: APEX_APPL_JSON_SOURCES
items.description: Available JSON Sources within an application

items.name: APEX_APPL_LOAD_TABLES
items.description: Identifies Application Legacy Data Loading definitions

items.name: APEX_APPL_LOAD_TABLE_LOOKUPS
items.description: Identifies a the collection of key lookups of the data loading tables

items.name: APEX_APPL_LOAD_TABLE_RULES
items.description: Identifies a collection of transformation rules that are to be used on the load tables.

items.name: APEX_APPL_MAP_BACKGROUNDS
items.description: Map background definitions

items.description: Stores the meta data for the plug-ins of an application.

items.description: Stores the meta data for the action positions of a Template Component plug-in.

items.description: Stores the possible values of a plug-in attribute if it's of type selectlist.

items.description: Stores the group titles for the plug-in attributes.

items.name: APEX_APPL_PLUGIN_EVENTS
items.description: Stores which events can be triggered by this plug-in. This events are used for binding dynamic actions.

items.description: Stores the files like CSS, images, javascript files, ... of a plug-in.

items.name: APEX_APPL_PLUGIN_SLOTS
items.description: Stores the meta data for the slots of a Template Component plug-in.

items.name: APEX_APPL_PLUGIN_STD_ATTRS
items.description: Stores additional meta data for plug-in standard attributes.

items.name: APEX_APPL_PLUGIN_SETTINGS

items.description: Database object referenced by an application

items.description: Application code fragment analysed for database object dependencies

items.name: APEX_DG_BLUEPRINTS
items.description: Blueprint for data generation. See the apex_dg_data_gen API

items.name: APEX_DG_BP_DATA_SOURCES
items.description: Custom locations to obtain data for a blueprint. See the apex_dg_data_gen API

items.name: APEX_DG_BP_TABLES
items.description: Defintion of output tables for data generation. Must be unique within a blueprint. See the apex_dg_data_gen API.

items.name: APEX_DG_BP_TAB_COLUMNS
items.description: Defintion of output columns for data generation. Must be unique within a blueprint. See the apex_dg_data_gen API.

items.name: APEX_ISSUES
items.description: All Issues logged within the APEX ISSUE system.

items.name: APEX_ISSUE_ATTACHMENTS
items.description: Attachments associated with a given issue.

items.name: APEX_ISSUE_COMMENTS
items.description: Lists all comments for a spcific issue.

items.name: APEX_ISSUE_EVENTS
items.description: All events linked to either an ISSUE_ID or COMMENT_ID.

items.name: APEX_ISSUE_LABEL_RELATION
items.description: A list of Issues and associated labels.

items.name: APEX_ISSUE_MILESTONE_RELATION
items.description: A list of Issues and associated Milestones.

items.name: APEX_ISSUE_NOTIFICATIONS
items.description: Issue system notifications for a given user.

items.name: APEX_ISSUE_STAKEHOLDERS
items.description: Stakeholders (ASSIGNEES or SUBSCRIBERS) for a given issue

items.name: APEX_ISSUE_EMAIL_PREFS
items.description: A list of Issues and associated Milestones.

items.name: APEX_ISSUE_LABEL_GROUPS
items.description: All Label Groups available to the issues system.

items.name: APEX_ISSUE_LABELS
items.description: All Labels available to the issues system.

items.name: APEX_ISSUE_MILESTONES
items.description: All milestones available to the issues system.

items.description: Groups of REST Source Catalogs

items.description: REST Source Catalogs

items.description: RESTful services resource parameters

items.description: Identifies user feedback followup.

items.name: APEX_WORKSPACE_ACCESS_LOG
items.description: One row is logged for each login attempt.

items.name: APEX_WORKSPACE_ACTIVITY_LOG
items.description: Page view activity log detail.  One row is logged for each page view for application with logging enabled.

items.name: APEX_WORKSPACE_LOG_ARCHIVE
items.description: Page view activity is a daily summary of workspace acitivity that is retained until physically purged

items.name: APEX_WORKSPACE_LOG_SUMMARY
items.description: Page view activity log summarized by application for the last 14 days

items.name: APEX_WORKSPACE_LOG_SUMMARY_USR
items.description: Page view activity log summarized by user for the last two weeks

items.name: APEX_WORKSPACE_AI_SERVICES
items.description: Generative AI Services configured within an application.

items.description: Oracle APEX workspace users

items.description: Clicks in Oracle APEX that are tracked by using APEX_UTIL.COUNT_CLICKS

items.name: APEX_WORKSPACE_COUNT
items.description: Instance workspace count

items.name: APEX_WORKSPACE_CREDENTIALS
items.description: Identifies the credentials within a workspace

items.description: Oracle APEX workspace developers, APEX users with privilege to develop applications

items.description: Extension Links Grants configured in APEX workspaces

items.description: Extension Links configured in APEX workspaces

items.name: APEX_WORKSPACE_FILES
items.description: Identifies uploaded files belonging to the workspace in the modplsql or EPG documents table

items.name: APEX_WORKSPACE_GROUPS
items.description: Oracle APEX workspace groups/application roles

items.description: Oracle APEX workspace group/application role to group/role relationship

items.name: APEX_WORKSPACE_GROUP_USERS
items.description: Oracle APEX workspace users and groups relationship

items.name: APEX_WORKSPACE_PREFERENCES
items.description: Oracle APEX workspace preferences

items.name: APEX_WORKSPACE_PRINT_SERVERS
items.description: Print servers configured within an application

items.description: Remote servers configured within an application

items.description: Remote servers configured within an application

items.description: Database Schemas mapped to APEX workspaces

items.description: Oracle APEX sessions by workspace and APEX user

items.description: Oracle APEX groups that are dynamically assigned to sessions

items.description: Identifies SQL Scripts used to execute SQL and PL/SQL commands

items.description: Stores the files like CSS, images, javascript files, ... of a workspace.

items.description: (Obsolete) The UI Types identify the available user interface types of a workspace

items.description: Vector Providers configured within an application.
